item.title: MPW
item.description: score:74 Chances: Investors looking to own winning stocks need to know which sectors are outperforming other sectors when making purchase decisions. The healthcare REIT sub sector has emerged as the new leader among REITs. A subtle yet promising upswing in home sales suggests a potential opportunity for REITs.
